Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team head to Tutbury Castle in Derbyshire to investigate the paranormal reports at the location. Past Hunters appear to have caught the Tutbury Ghost on camera.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: San Antonio is rich with Texas, Mexican, and Spanish history. We make our last stand at the Alamo, and visit Missions National Historical Park. Lastly, we spelunk the Natural Bridge Caverns underground.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: The name alone conjures up mysterious and exotic images. The architecture and backstory to this once powerful independent kingdom, is both amazing and horrifying. Outside the city, Zanzibar earns its "Spice Island" nickname due to the huge plantations that grow everything to make your cooking flavorful. Journeys final stop is to visit the highly endangered Red Colobus monkeys. Learn why these human-like primates eat dirt for survival.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: All the essentials for going on, and having a successful safari are covered before our host gets a very special challenge—to find at least half of the "Big Twelve" on one safari drive. Four hours and six (6) very special animals—can he do it using his own rules for a successful safari?

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Go for launch! We visit Space Shuttle Endeavor at the California Science Center. Then, we check out the glitch and glamour at the Hollywood Museum. Well learn about the Holocaust at the Holocaust Museum and Japanese Internment during WWII at the Japanese/American National Museum. After that, we dig for bones at the famous La Brea Tar Pits.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: O Say can you see? Were in Baltimore, MD. Well learn about the Battle of Baltimore at Fort McHenry and the inspiration of the Star Spangled Banner. Then we dig deep into the history of Baltimores most famous resident, Edgar Allan Poe. Well sift through a huge collection of pop art and collectibles at the Geppi Museum, and learn about cracking codes at the National Cryptology museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: 100 years ago, two young Argentine pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, were the first men to cross the Andes Mountains through the air aboard a precarious balloon. They flew more than 8. 000 meters, from Santiago of Chile to Mendoza in Argentina. Relive the feelings and passions of two men who courageously pushed the bounds of flight in ways previously unimaginable. The first attempts to fly in early 1900 and how to fly today on the Andes mountain range.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed with exciting tidbits and fascinating facts that uncover the truths and origins behind the stuff youre already familiar with. From the items you use every day to the phrases you use in conversation to the habits youre so accustomed to, youll be fascinated to learn how theyve all really come about! Learn how a pharmacist and an accountant created the most famous drink in the world, COCA COLA! And, learn the "BEAR" truth behind how a U.S. president helped create everyones favorite stuffed toy, THE TEDDY BEAR! Then, how did a piece of wire accidentally "SLINK" its way to become a fantastic fun toy for children? Plus, how a the WIFFLE BALL was invented.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity POPSICLE! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the BARBERSHOP? Youll be in STITCHES when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the MICROWAVE!

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads

The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: NASAS Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europes Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: Alien Invaders!
programme.desc: Alien Invaders is a documentary special that throws three young, but experienced, hosts into the world of invasive species of animals, fish, birds, insects, viruses and plants to create television mayhem. The show looks at invasions of aggressive non-indigenous animals around the world. Pacific lionfish are eating their way through the Caribbean, Burmese pythons are infesting the Everglades, African killer bees have worked their way north from Brazil to Utah, Asian carp are now swimming in the millions from New Orleans to Chicago. These and many other "alien invaders" are the villains (and stars!) of our show.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters investigate Thackray Medical Museum, believed to one of Leeds most haunted buildings. Workers claim to have witnessed constant paranormal activity in the museum and one claim is that two Victorian ghosts are trapped inside of the location.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files

Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: All the essentials for going on, and having a successful safari are covered before our host gets a very special challenge—to find at least half of the "Big Twelve" on one safari drive. Four hours and six (6) very special animals—can he do it using his own rules for a successful safari?

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit. The sky above is littered with stars and countless galaxies. It is where we come from and where we are destined to return. The first phase of this journey is complete, now commences the second, with robotics, advanced technologies and sheer daring we are now going where before we only dreamt.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: If you ever go camping there is one thing you do not want to leave home without, the SWISS ARMY KNIFE! Well explain how it evolved into the most famous knife in the world and how the companys name got "CUT" together! And where did the term CUP OF JOE come from as well as the word JAVA? And we all love a juicy HAMBURGER, so where did these chopped meat patties come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn how ALMOND NUTS get transformed into "MILK." And why are movie TRAILERS shown at the beginning of the film? Well keep your attention so youll want to stick around for the answer. And learn how detergents make your clothes SEEM brighter and whiter.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: China Uncovered is a documentary exploring the changing culture of China, from everyday life to nature and cities, from tradition to modernism. Discover this country from the perspective of locals, including a photographer, a laborer and an architect. Witness how Shanghai turned into a mega city from a small fishing village, and how is that affecting the everyday life and traditional practices and beliefs.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: Rosemary catches up with the conservancys rarest large carnivore, a coalition of 3 male cheetahs. The Pungwe pack get waist deep into their hunting as they pursue a wildebeest into a water pan. Denning season has begun. The pack are on the hunt for impala. Rosemary deals with a shocking snare removal. The splinters take on another herd of wildebeest.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: Very quick intro to the history of the course and the make up of the influx of new students as well as a look at some of the lecturers and their characters. Darting practice and drug theory: Students practice with dart guns from certain distances and learn the theory of dangerous drugs. The next step is learning to dart from a helicopter. A moving target is towed by a vehicle, and students have 1 dart to prove their accuracy. Darting practice on donkeys: 3 teams are formed and they have 3 donkeys to dart and check all vital signs. Darting 2 young antelope: 2 students are chosen to dart a young Rhone antelope and young Sable needing medical attention.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: A student darter is selected to dart from the helicopter and soon a suitable giraffe is located. The dart location is perfect and the giraffe begins to slow down as the rest of the team jump into action. The giraffe becomes more of a challenge as it wrestles with the rope and breaks free. The drugs eventually take full effect and the giraffe is subdued. The team carry out all the checkups, take samples and reverse the drug in good time to see it run off in good health. The vet lecturers give the debrief and conclude with all the positives and negatives.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Animals with certain adaptations are more likely to be stronger and therefore produce more young. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old, whereas dinosaurs became extinct 64 million years ago. Crocodiles have an incredible ability to adapt and survive in the Race of Life. They have a very slow metabolism, and can go up to a year with no food. They also have a 4 chamber heart that helps them control their temperature, and lungs that allow them to hold their breath underwater for up to 2 hours. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well. The modern descendants of ancient sharks have incorporated many of the successful traits of the past. They have changed over time, but the changes have not been too extreme, only nature perfecting an originally near perfect design. Whales are an amazing species that have evolved from land dwelling creatures millions of years ago to the marine mammals we know today. Over the course of their evolution whales have developed echolocation, thick layers of blubber, modified lungs, better hearing and larger arteries among other things to ensure their survival and prosperity.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Deserts are dry. Deserts are extreme. True deserts get less than 18 cm of rain per year. True deserts have very few plants. Semi-desert habitats have enough rainfall to support more plant and animal life. Either way, deserts are not easy places for animals to live. Desert animals have evolved to handle the deserts heat and lack of water. They have adapted their bodies and behaviors to the desert climate. Most can survive on small amounts of water and many get all of their water from their food. Some drink maybe once a week and travel considerable distances to find isolated waterholes and springs. Large animals seek shade during the hottest part of the day. Some animals dig a hollow depression into the ground and lie in the cooler soil while others are nocturnal. Many reptiles and other animals protect themselves from the extreme temperature by spending their time in burrows. The scorpion is one of the most ancient creatures on earth, in existence since life first crawled out of the sea. One look and you can see why theyre born survivors. Not only are their bodies armoured against the desert heat - and other predators - but all scorpions have pincers at the front and a poisonous sting at the end of their tail. Rattlesnakes can be two meters long. Theyre fast, tough and with a deadly venom, making them one of the most dangerous snakes in the world. But nobody seems to have told the Roadrunner, who regard rattlesnakes as quite suitable prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: 3 wild dog packs are introduced, Pungwe, Mapura and Splinters pack. We see 16 Pungwe pups emerge for the first time out of their den site. The motorbike camera crew manage to record their first successful wild dog hunt. Rosemary and Jess are urgently called out to dart and remove the snare from one of the dogs. Another hunt is recorded by the motorbike and filming drone crew.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours - road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology. Over the past forty years, all of the worlds superpowers have built up these groups in order to better fight wars, to counter terrorism and to conduct high-stakes police actions. This episode examines the history of such organizations, from the Green Berets, WWII paratroopers and naval special warfare units through to the Seal Team 6, the British SAS, and private contractors, including Black Water and Brown and Root. Showing how these operators are trained, how they plan, and what weaponry and tactical gear they use, the introductory episode of CQB provides viewers with a fast-paced overview of the techniques, strategies and equipment that have been successfully used by Military Special Operations.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: 1991. gada vasarā attālāki radi rada paniku Kalifornijas dienvidos - viņi uzsāk visbriesmīgāko nejaušības veida noziegumu sēriju, kuru mērķis ir ikdienišķi cilvēki.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Brutālu septiņu mēnešu garumā brāļu trijotne izdara virkni progresējoši vardarbīgāku noziegumu Ričmondas pilsētā, atstājot aiz sevis arvien lielāku mirstīgo personu skaitu. Pat pēc aizturēšanas šos brāļus ir grūti savaldīt.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Braitonbīčā pazūd ukraiņu imigrants. Tiesībaizsardzības iestāžu labāko aģentu komanda no Ņujorkas policijas, ASV prokurora biroja un FIB sadarbojas, lai noskaidrotu notikušo.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Izmeklētāji steidz pārtvert brīvībā esošu slepkavu - pie ezera Teksasā uzieta mirusi jauna sieviete.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad miris tiek atrasts jauns vīrietis ar lieliem sapņiem, izmeklētāji seko naudai, meklējot viņa slepkavu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Alabamas štata Mobilā vīrietis, kurš mainīja savu dzīvi, tiek aukstasinīgi nošauts. Izmeklētājiem jānoskaidro, vai viņa sarežģītā pagātne ir atgriezusies viņu vajāt.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā apšaudes rezultātā iet bojā vīrietis, kurš sēdēja savā automašīnā ar divgadīgo meitu aizmugurējā sēdeklī. Gados vecāks vīrietis Atlantā sadeg ēkas ugunsgrēkā, kas, domājams, ir ļaunprātīga dedzināšana.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pāris par dzīvi varenāku identisku dvīņu veic virkni brutālu uzbrukumu mazā Tenesī pilsētiņā; ar katru noziegumu brāļi kļūst arvien drosmīgāki.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad noslepkavots labošanas darbu virsnieks, tas šķiet kā atriebība. Tomēr tiek atklāts mīlas trīsstūris; uzzinājis, ka viņa sievai ir romāns, vīrs plāno nogalināt viņas mīļāko un lūdz palīdzību saviem brāļiem.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pazudušas personas lieta iegūst citu nokrāsu, kad izmeklētāji uzzina, ka kādreizējais mīļotais vecākais brālis, šķiet, ir piesavinājies naudu no ģimenes biznesa. Viņa radiniekiem ir motivācija atriebībai.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Piecu bērnu māte atrasta mirusi savās mājās. Vai viņa tika noslepkavota vai viņa slēpj kādu tumšu noslēpumu?

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Pēc ballēšanās nošauts alternatīvi domājošs pusaudzis. Policija izmeklē vai to nevajadzētu uzskatīt par naida noziegumu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs pārbauda jaunas sievietes slepkavību vietējā "mīlētāju joslā" Leitonas Buzzardā 1937. gadā. Viņas bijušais draugs tika atzīts par vainīgu viņas slepkavībā, bet viņa brāļameitas uzskata, ka viņš bija nevainīgs.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata traģisko gadījumu, kad 1942. gadā Birmingemā tika noslēgts neveiksmīgs pašnāvības pakts, kurā jauna sieviete gāja bojā, bet viņas precētais mīļākais tika notiesāts par viņas slepkavību un pakārts.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti pēta lietu, kas saistīta ar vardarbību ģimenē, laulības pārkāpšanu, atriebību un slepkavību Jorkšīras pilsētā 1903. gadā.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Tetovēšanas salona īpašnieks Deniss Ābrahamsens atrasts brutāli noslepkavots, kails uz masāžas galda savās mājās. Pierādījumi liecina par traku seksa ballīti, kas ar slavenu pieaugušo aktrisi beigusies nelāgi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaista divu bērnu māte Kristāla Makdauela pazuda viesuļvētras Hārvija laikā, kas plosās Hjūstonā. Novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie viņas slepkavas.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kriss Paciello ir Sautbīčas klubu karalis, kuru dievina tādas slavenības kā Madonna un Sofija Vergara. Tomēr viņa ideālā pasaule tiks sagrauta, ja tiks atklāta viņa tumšā un vardarbīgā pagātne.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Tas ir viņas Holivudas sapņa piepildījums - sieviete ir sapinusies ar kādu vīrieti, pasaulslavena aktiera dēlu. Kad viņa tiek atrasta nošauta, izmeklētāji brīnās - vai kāds no viņas mīlētajiem vīriešiem viņu aukstasinīgi nogalināja?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: No tumšā tīkla ēnām iznirst noslēpumains ļaundaris, kurš nav gatavs apstāties ne pa kam, lai aizsargātu savu vairākus miljardus dolāru vērto tiešsaistes impēriju Silk Road. Kas nepieciešams, lai atrastu vīrieti aiz melnā tirgus tīmekļa vietnes, kurai ir nāvējošas sekas?

programme.desc: Alabamas štata Mobilā vīrietis, kurš mainīja savu dzīvi, tiek aukstasinīgi nošauts. Izmeklētājiem jānoskaidro, vai viņa sarežģītā pagātne ir atgriezusies viņu vajāt.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā apšaudes rezultātā iet bojā vīrietis, kurš sēdēja savā automašīnā ar divgadīgo meitu aizmugurējā sēdeklī. Gados vecāks vīrietis Atlantā sadeg ēkas ugunsgrēkā, kas, domājams, ir ļaunprātīga dedzināšana.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pāris par dzīvi varenāku identisku dvīņu veic virkni brutālu uzbrukumu mazā Tenesī pilsētiņā; ar katru noziegumu brāļi kļūst arvien drosmīgāki.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad noslepkavots labošanas darbu virsnieks, tas šķiet kā atriebība. Tomēr tiek atklāts mīlas trīsstūris; uzzinājis, ka viņa sievai ir romāns, vīrs plāno nogalināt viņas mīļāko un lūdz palīdzību saviem brāļiem.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pazudušas personas lieta iegūst citu nokrāsu, kad izmeklētāji uzzina, ka kādreizējais mīļotais vecākais brālis, šķiet, ir piesavinājies naudu no ģimenes biznesa. Viņa radiniekiem ir motivācija atriebībai.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Piecu bērnu māte atrasta mirusi savās mājās. Vai viņa tika noslepkavota vai viņa slēpj kādu tumšu noslēpumu?

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Pēc ballēšanās nošauts alternatīvi domājošs pusaudzis. Policija izmeklē vai to nevajadzētu uzskatīt par naida noziegumu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaista divu bērnu māte Kristāla Makdauela pazuda viesuļvētras Hārvija laikā, kas plosās Hjūstonā. Novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie viņas slepkavas.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: No tumšā tīkla ēnām iznirst noslēpumains ļaundaris, kurš nav gatavs apstāties ne pa kam, lai aizsargātu savu vairākus miljardus dolāru vērto tiešsaistes impēriju Silk Road. Kas nepieciešams, lai atrastu vīrieti aiz melnā tirgus tīmekļa vietnes, kurai ir nāvējošas sekas?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Džeremijs Deins un Saša Vass pēta, vai baumu un tenku dēļ tika pakārta jauna māte, kas apsūdzēta par savas ģimenes saindēšanu 1850. gadā.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Glamūrīgā bijusī modele Samira Fraša dzīvoja greznu dzīvi, īrējot vairākas mājas un pārvietojoties ar luksusa automašīnām. Līdz notika traģēdija. Divu bērnu māte tika atrasta mirusi sava peldbaseina gultnē, un abi viņas bērni bija pazuduši no mājas.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Ņujorkas sabiedrisku dāmu terorizē sadistisks vajātājs, kurš draud nolaupīt viņas meitu. Kas viņš ir? Kāpēc viņš viņu spīdzina? Un cik tālu viņš ies?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Uz ielas tiek atrasts nošauts jauns vīrietis, un netālu nošauts otrs upuris. Izmeklētāji steidzas izsekot bīstamo šāvēju, pirms viņš nogalina vēlreiz.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Vienā no traģiskākajiem un brutālākajiem noziegumiem Grīnpleinā, pieci tīņi, kas spēlējās pie ugunskura, nonāk slazdā - pret viņiem vēršas trijotne ar ieročiem. Vienīgais izdzīvojušais drosmīgi palīdz izmeklētājiem meklēt viņas uzbrucējus.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kad sērijveida lūriķis nonācis brīvībā, Als veic vislielāko upurēšanos, mazinot Pegijas izmisumu par to, ka viņa vienīgā nekļūs par upuri. Bads apmāca Kelliju, lai viņa varētu pāriet uz nākamo klasi. Diemžēl, lai viņas smadzenēs atbrīvotu vietu jaunai informācijai, vecās pamatzināšanas tiek izstumtas.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Darba svētkos dzimumu lomas tiek mainītas - Als kļūst par slaistu, bet viņš piespiež Pegiju sagatavot piemājas bārbekjū, lai radītu savu slaveno "Bundy Burgers". Taču viens no viņu garšas noslēpumiem ir Mārsijas mirušās tantes pelni, ko Kellija nozaga no Rodu mājas.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kellijai un Badam jāsavāc nauda koncerta biļetēm, tāpēc Bads pārdod Alu par kempinga gidu, bet Kellija krāpjas pokera spēlē ar Pegijas draugiem. Ar Stīvu un Badu ceļā, Alam kempingā ir jāpavada daudz bērnu. Viņi nonāk mežā, un tikai Baks var viņus izglābt.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kellijai un Badam jāsavāc nauda koncerta biļetēm, tāpēc Bads pārdod Alu par kempinga gidu, bet Kellija krāpjas pokera spēlē ar Pegijas draugiem. Ar Stīvu un Badu ceļā, Alam kempingā ir jāpavada daudz bērnu. Viņi nonāk mežā, un tikai Baks var viņus izglābt.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Zobu sāpes liek Alam apmeklēt Mārsijas zobārstu - šķirtu vīrieti, kurš darbam velta tikpat daudz laika, cik savai jaunajai zobārsta asistentei. Tajā pašā laikā Als piespiež Pegiju pagatavot viņam tikai vienu maltīti.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad viņa iecienītākie kartupeļu čipsi tiek izņemti no uzkodu automāta, Džeks sāk uzkodu karu ar Studentu padomi. Mērija un Mišela mēģina pateikt nē Stefas nerimstošajai sāncensībai — ar neviennozīmīgiem rezultātiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad Džeku vecāku un skolotāju konferencē piesaista kāda skolēna māte, viņš izliekas ieinteresēts viņas dēla Kolina izaugsmē. Vecāku grupa sūdzas direktoram Durbinam - viņi pamana pretrunīgi vērtētu studentu mākslas darbu no Mērijas klases.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks saņem piedāvājumu no Mailsa izdevēja uzrakstīt labas pašsajūtas filozofijas grāmatu, kas varētu būt viņa biļete prom no Toledo. Durbins nejauši saceļ emocionālu vētru, atklājot, ka, kamēr Stefa par savu ārkārtas kontaktpersonu izvēlējās Mariju, Mērija izvēlējās Mišelu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Viktora vecāki devušies ārpus pilsētas, Džeks izmanto viņu māju, lai rīkotu savas bijušās draudzenes līdzekļu vākšanas svētkus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs cīnās ar vīramāti par vārda došanu bērnam. Fils neveiksmīgi mēģina atrisināt savu bērnu problēmas. Mičels un Kamerons cenšas ierobežot Lilijas smeldzību.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kems paliek bez līderpozīcijas pirmajā skolas izrādē "Operas spoks". Fils un Mičels spēlē golfu ar Džeju, un Heilija un viņas draugs palīdz Klērai rūpēties par bērnu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fila un Klēras Valentīnadienas plāni noved Klēru līdz neatliekamās palīdzības nodaļai. Džejs un Glorija pirmo reizi pēc bērna piedzimšanas cenšas būt intīmi. Mičels savā ballītē pēc dzeršanas pavada mežonīgu Valentīna vakaru.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fila un Klēras Valentīnadienas plāni noved Klēru līdz neatliekamās palīdzības nodaļai. Džejs un Glorija pirmo reizi pēc bērna piedzimšanas cenšas būt intīmi. Mičels savā ballītē pēc dzeršanas pavada mežonīgu Valentīna vakaru.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Mičels un Kamerons ir līgavaiņa palīgi draugu kāzās, bet līgavai ir aukstas kājas. Tikmēr Menijs ir iemīlējies auklītē. Fils palīdz Lūkam norunāt randiņu, bet Klēra un Heilija kopā dodas uz Aleksas koncertu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks negribīgi piekrīt doties uz pilsētu kopā ar Mariju, Stefu un Mišelu. Tomēr viņa pārākuma komplekss Toledo sievietēm ir grūti pārvarams. Direktors Durbins jūtas apdraudēts, kad Helēna viņa vietā izdara skolas video rīta paziņojumus.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad Džeku vecāku un skolotāju konferencē piesaista kāda skolēna māte, viņš izliekas ieinteresēts viņas dēla Kolina izaugsmē. Vecāku grupa sūdzas direktoram Durbinam - viņi pamana pretrunīgi vērtētu studentu mākslas darbu no Mērijas klases.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls turpina satikties ar Donnu pat pēc tam, kad uzzina, ka viņa ir precējusies un iepazīstas ar viņas vīru. Dvaits un Andžela nodod savu bērnu līgumu pie šķīrējtiesneša, un Džims un Pema cenšas palikt nomodā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džo ierodas Skrantonas filiālē, lai atrastu trauksmes cēlēju. Trīs dažādi cilvēki ir atzinušies Maiklam, un Maikls viņus aizsargā. Cilvēks, ko vairums cilvēku uzskata par vainīgo, tur muti.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Visi pieprasa, lai Maikls atlaiž jauno biroja palīgu, bet viņš to nedarīs, jo ir viņa radinieks. Pema mēģina izjokot Dvaitu, kurš ir nopircis biroja ēku, tā kompensējot Džima joka sabojāšanu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls ir spiests doties uz pārrunām ar Tobiju. Dvaits vēlas atriebties vietējam tirdzniecības centram, kas atteicās no sadarbības. Pema mēģina viltot savu ceļu uz paaugstinājumu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Endijs uzaicina visu biroju noskatīties viņu amatierteātra iestudējumu "Svīnijs Tods", taču Erina nolemj tā vietā pieskatīt Džima un Pemas mazo. Maikls ir sarūgtināts, jo pieteicās uz galveno lomu, bet viņam to nepiešķīra.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegijai sāk rasties aizdomas, ka Als krāpjas - šķiet, ka viņam ir daudz dažādu attaisnojumu, kāpēc viņš pārnāk mājās vēlāk nekā parasti. Pegija satiek Džindžeru savā skaistumkopšanas salonā. Džindžera ir jauna sieviete, kura atzīst, ka guļ kopā ar citas sievietes vīru, un Pegija domā, ka tas varētu būt Als.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Jaunākā Bandiju naudas pelnīšanas shēma ir uzņemt savā garāžā ārvalstu apmaiņas studentu. Taču franču skaistule izrādās tik populāra, ka galu galā nozog visus Kellijas draugus.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kad Playboy Playmate ienāk Ala apavu veikalā, viņš ļoti vēlas atgriezties mājās un apskatīt 1987. gada oktobra numuru ar viņas attēliem. Tomēr Als ir salauzts vīrietis, kad uzzina, ka Pegija ir pārdevusi visu Playboy kolekciju, lai iegūtu naudu, lai nopirktu veiksmes piekariņu, lai laimētu loterijā. Vēlāk parādās Ala tēva spoks un pārliecina viņu atgūt zināmu pašcieņu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla pavada lēdiju Virdžīniju Revelu uz viņas mājām. Grāfs Ludvigs tiek atrasts miris Entonija Keida rokās. Kāpēc Keids ir Čimniju mājās? Vai Virdžīnijas pielūdzējs tiek apsūdzēts slepkavībā?

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: 2. pasaules kara laikā viesnīcā "Walsingham" ir daudz kas noticis, bet slepkavība? Kad kapteinis Ors saindējas ar kokteili viesnīcas bārā, šķiet, ka iespējamiem aizdomās turamiem nav gala.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izsaukta no piekrastes mājām, lai pieprasītu savu noslēpumaino mantojumu, jaunā un ārprātīgā Peregrīna Fišere atklāj pasauli un mantojumu, ko atstājusi viņas tante Frīna.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Lietai pret Ēriku pieaugot, Peregrīna pārliecina viņu atklāties par pagātnes noziegumu, kas attīrīs viņa vārdu par slepkavībām, un Violetas apslēptie talanti pakļauj viņu un Peregrīnu briesmām.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārplas draugs tēvs Gormans tiek atrasts noslepkavots. Kad viņa saņem sarakstu ar vārdiem, ko Gormans nosūtījis brīdi pirms nāves, viņa apņemas atrast drauga slepkavu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Stāsts par 12 gadus senu vēsturi, kad Djūks un Elīza pirmo reizi satikās.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzas dzīvē viss ir kārtībā līdz brīdim, kad ierodas kāds paziņa, lai paustu šaubas par viņas lomu Nash and Sons. Djūks saņem piedāvājumu, kas izraisa attiecību krīzi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīze un Nešs joprojām nevar sastrādāties, kad saistībā ar kādu lietu ir jānonāk nozarē, kur cilvēki ir gatavi uz slepkavību, tikai lai saglabātu savus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad bagāts baronets viens pats nomirst savā istabā dienu pirms kāzām, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija jau atkal nonāk aizraujoša noslēpuma epicentrā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir nonākušas līdz savu spēju robežai, jo visiem ir alibi. Vai izdosiet uzzināt, kurš nogalināja seru Pīteru, pirms cieš vēl kāds cits?

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad kāds vīrs bez pases un saiknes ar Mārlovu tiek atrasts miris uz lauku ceļa, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija pēta noslēpumus un spriedzi, kas valda starp vietējiem iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Brakenreids ir pārsteigti, kad "Hamleta" aktieris viņu acu priekšā nomirst uz skatuves.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc noziedznieku bēgšanas no cietuma un bankas aplaupīšanas Mērdoks un Krebtrijs mēģina tikt galā ar ziņojumiem par vīru ar šaujošu roku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad jurista nāve tiek uzdota par suņa uzbrukumu, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka vainīgajiem ir vajadzīgs suns, kas mantojis milzīgu summu.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons uzstāj, ka pildīs tēva pienākumus, kad Džeimss mēģina panākt viņa padzīšanu no uzņēmuma. Soames apsola Irēnai pārcelties uz Parīzi, lai atbalstītu viņas deju karjeru pirms laulībām.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kentas policija meklē sērijveida slepkavu, kurš slepkavo atomelektrostacijas darbinieces. Dalgliešs ierodas, lai izmeklētu iespējamu saikni ar teroristiem.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Prezidents Puankrē piešķir Agnesei, Žannai, Margeritai un Karolīnai goda medaļas, tomēr visām prātā ir kas cits.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons uzstāj, ka pildīs tēva pienākumus, kad Džeimss mēģina panākt viņa padzīšanu no uzņēmuma. Soames apsola Irēnai pārcelties uz Parīzi, lai atbalstītu viņas deju karjeru pirms laulībām.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs izmeklē slepkavību ietekmīgas Eseksas ģimenes mājā. Viņš apsver iespēju, ka uzbrukumam ir politiski motīvi. Kāds vietējais iedzīvotājs apgalvo, ka noticis sprādziens.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Līvijai nākas likvidēt Marcellu, kurš pēc Gaja amata iegūšanas plāno nogalināt viņas dēlus un izraidīt viņu un Antigonu. Viņai jāīsteno pludmales indes plāns.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla pavada lēdiju Virdžīniju Revelu uz viņas mājām. Grāfs Ludvigs tiek atrasts miris Entonija Keida rokās. Kāpēc Keids ir Čimniju mājās? Vai Virdžīnijas pielūdzējs tiek apsūdzēts slepkavībā?

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai tiek uzdots atrisināt kāda augsta ranga privātā detektīva slepkavību, kura pagātne ir noslēpumos tīta.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Kārmodijam izdodas izcili nolikt eksāmenu un viņam piedāvā pētījumu programmu Londonā, Kārmodijs vēlas palikt Skeldeilā. Sigfrīds satraucas, ka viņš tikai kavē Kārmodiju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Endavers
programme.desc: Kad Bodleiana bibliotēkā tiek nogalināts bibliotekārs, Endaveram un Tērsdejam nav daudz, ar ko strādāt, — tikai dubļaini zābaku pēdu nospiedumi. Galvenajiem aizdomās turamajiem ir slepkavības motīvs.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai tiek uzdots atrisināt kāda augsta ranga privātā detektīva slepkavību, kura pagātne ir noslēpumos tīta.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Kārmodijam izdodas izcili nolikt eksāmenu un viņam piedāvā pētījumu programmu Londonā, Kārmodijs vēlas palikt Skeldeilā. Sigfrīds satraucas, ka viņš tikai kavē Kārmodiju.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Tiek atklāti rīcības motīvi, un slepkava sūta vēl vienu brīdinājumu Džūditai, Bekai un Sjūzijai, kam jādara viss iespējamais, lai pēc iespējas ātrāk atrisinātu lietu.

programme.title: Endavers
programme.desc: Kad Bodleiana bibliotēkā tiek nogalināts bibliotekārs, Endaveram un Tērsdejam nav daudz, ar ko strādāt, — tikai dubļaini zābaku pēdu nospiedumi. Galvenajiem aizdomās turamajiem ir slepkavības motīvs.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Krebtrijs un Efija ierodas uz Dikensa dzimšanas dienas svinībām, mājastēvs tiek atrasts miris.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainais policijas inspektors Rikardi ir nolādēts, tomēr viņa lāsts ir visai noderīgs. Viņš var redzēt vardarbīgā nāvē mirušo spokus un dzirdēt viņu pēdējās domas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Adams Dalgliešs tiek aizsūtīts uz medmāsu skolu, lai izmeklētu kādas demonstrācijas laikā noindētas studentes nāvi. Pēc citas studentes nāves Dalglieša slepkavas medības kļūst intensīvākas.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Tiek atklāti rīcības motīvi, un slepkava sūta vēl vienu brīdinājumu Džūditai, Bekai un Sjūzijai, kam jādara viss iespējamais, lai pēc iespējas ātrāk atrisinātu lietu.

programme.title: Men | Short Program Grand Prix | Canada
Women | Free Program Grand Prix | Canada
Men | Free Program Grand Prix | Canada
Mixed Ice Dancing | Free Program Grand Prix | Canada
Pairs | Free Program Grand Prix | Canada
Premier League. West Ham United - Newcastle United
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Delicate Gravity
programme.desc: Paul (Yvan Attal) and Claire (Anne Parillaud) are two lonely people who meet because of a cell phone call to a wrong number. Claire send a message and Paul receives it. The man believes that Claire goes through a breakdown and she might commit suicide. Philippe Andres picture won prizes at festivals in Palm Springs and Nevada.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Robots vārdā Čapijs
programme.desc: Čaplijs - brīnumbērns. Kā jau jebkurš bērns, viņš nokļūs savas apkārtējās vides ietekmē un tikai viņa sirds un dvēsele palīdz atrast savu īsto ceļu. Tomēr ir viena lieta, kāpēc Čaplijs nav līdzīgs visiem pārējiem - viņš ir pirmais robots, kurš spēj just un domāt.

programme.title: Bēgšana no Šoušenkas
programme.desc: Filma ir par baņķieri Endiju Defrēnu, kam piespriesti divi mūža ieslodzījumi par sievas un viņas mīļākā nogalināšanu. Cietumā viņš sadraudzējas ar Elisu Boidu "Redu" Redingu, Defrēns jūtas drošībā pēc tam, kad viņa zināšanas finanšu nozarē izmanto cietuma darbinieki un ieslodzītie.

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: 23 gadīgais Mičs zaudējis savu līgavu teroristu uzbrukumā ir apsēsts ar atriebību. Viņš uzsāk apmācības specvienības rotā, lai atrastu un nogalinātu tos, kuri ir atbildīgi par viņas līgavas slepkavību. Par viņa instruktoru tiek nozīmēts Aukstā kara veterāns, ar kuru kopā viņi izmeklēs it kā savstarpēji nesaistītus teroristu uzbrukumus. Izmeklēšana viņus aizvedīs uz pēdām izbijušam CIP aģentam, kurš ir apmāts ar kara uzsākšanu Tuvajos austrumos.

programme.title: Krustnagliņu slepkava
programme.desc: Ārēji perfekta ģimene ir satriekta, kad pārlieku tuvu viņu mājām sāk uzdarboties sērijveida slepkava. Dilans Makdermots perfekti izstāsīts šo stindzinošo stāstu par amerikāņu ļaunumu.

programme.title: Trauksmes signāls
programme.desc: Filmā vēstīts par korumpētu policistu grupu, kas nokļuvusi mafijas šantāžas tīklā. Iebiedējot un šantažējot reiz paklupušus policistus, ļaundari piespiež viņus pastrādāt noziegumu pēc nozieguma. Plānojot lielu aplaupīšanu, policisti izšķiras novākt vienu no saviem kolēģiem.

programme.title: Mūzika un vārdi
programme.desc: Apjukušam dziedātājam dotas pāris dienas, lai sacerētu hitu, kas iekaros topu un kļūs par pusaudžu sensāciju. Lai gan viņš nekad mūžā nav sarakstījis pienācīgu dziesmu tekstu, viņā uzplaiksnī dzirksts ar neparastu jaunāku sievieti ar izcilu vārdu mākslu.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

programme.title: Vai spēsi man kādreiz piedot?
programme.desc: Lī Israela pagājušā gadsimta 70. un 80. gados karjeru veidoja, profilējot slavenības, piemēram, Ketrinu Hepbērnu, Estē Lauderu vai žurnālisti Dorotiju Kilgalenu. Kad viņa to vairs nespēja, jo bija zaudējusi ķērienu mainīgās gaumes dēļ, viņa, lojālā drauga Džeka mudināta, pievēršas maldināšanai.

programme.title: Dzimumu cīņa
programme.desc: Tenisa mačs 1973. gadā starp Billiju Džīnu Kingu un Bobiju Rigsu kļuva par televīzijas vēsturē skatītājo sporta notikumu. Ierauti mediju uzmanības virpulī, Kinga un Rigss ārpus korta cīnījās ar daudzkārt svarīgākām lietām.

programme.title: Tēvi un meitas
programme.desc: Džeiks ir Pulicera balvu ieguvis rakstnieks, kurš traģiskā auto katastrofā zaudē savu mūža mīlestību un ir spiests vienatnē audzināt savu piecgadīgo meitu Keitiju. Pārvarējis vainas izjūtu par savas sievas nāvi, viņš cīnās gan ar ikdienas tēva pienākumiem, gan pret pārlieku valdonīgajiem radiniekiem, kuri grib atņemt viņam tēva tiesības un paši audzināt Keitiju.

programme.title: Fabelmeni
programme.desc: Augot Arizonā pēc Otrā pasaules kara, jaunais Semijs Fabelmens pusaudža gados vēlas kļūt par kinorežisoru. Drīz vien viņš atklāj satriecošu ģimenes noslēpumu un pēta, kā filmu spēks var palīdzēt viņam saskatīt patiesību.

programme.title: Dzīve aiz kadra
programme.desc: Meklējot ideālu filmēšanas vietu mazā, klusā pilsētiņā Vecās Dzirnas atbrauc kino darbinieki. Šeit viņi taisās lēti un ātri uzņemt savu jauno šedevru, kura darbība risinās uz vecu ūdens dzirnavu fona.
