programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 6: Risk Taking. Cooking game.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 7: Simplicity. The bruised and exhausted chefs show their skill with simplicity as Brooke Williamson decides which four chefs will receive a spot in the finale.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Cīņas klubs
programme.desc: "Cīņas kluba" galvenais varonis ir vārdā nenosaukts automašīnu firmas darbinieks, kurš cieš no bezmiega un kopumā ir dziļi neapmierināts ar savu karjeras izvēli. Kopā ar ziepju vārītāju Taileru Dērdenu viņš izveido cīņas klubu un tiek ierauts Tailera un kādas izklaidīgas sievietes, Marlas Singeres, attiecību krustugunīs. Režisors Finčers bija iecerējis, ka "Cīņas kluba" vardarbība ir kā metafora konfliktam starp jauno paaudzi un reklāmas industrijas vērtību sistēmu. Kino kritiķi filmu vērtējuši ļoti dažādi. Tā tiek dēvēta par vienu no pretrunīgākajām un aprunātākajām 1999. gada filmām. Savukārt filmas DVD versija bija komerciāli veiksmīga un padarīja "Cīņas klubu" par kulta filmu.

programme.title: Randiņfilma
programme.desc: Atrast savu īsto mūža mīlestību nav nemaz tik viegli. Bet, kad tas notiek, sākas ļoti gara pārpratumu virkne, jo iemīļotais taču vēl ir jāiepazīstina ar saviem draugiem. Arī tas būtu nieks. Viņš ir jāiepazīstina ar saviem vecākiem! Kuri noteikti nav parasti un normāli vecāki, bet gan vecāki ar neiedomājami daudz dīvainībām, no kurām lielāko daļu tu nebiji līdz šim pamanījusi. Un vēl tā seksīgā kāzu plānotāja! Beigās izrādās, ka palikt kopā ar savu iemīļoto līdz kāzām ir patiešām grūts pārbaudījums.

programme.title: Nakts pelde
programme.desc: Kāda ģimene pārvācas uz jaunām mājām, nenojaušot, ka nama tumšais noslēpums izraisīs ļauna spēka izlaušanos caur pagalma peldbaseinu.

programme.title: Atstātie
programme.desc: 1970. gada Ziemassvētki. Prestižā skolā uz svētku brīvdienām paliek visu nīstais skolotājs Pols, skolas pavāre Mērija un piecpadsmit gadus vecais Anguss. Pa šīm dienām šie tik ļoti atšķirīgie cilvēki ne tikai iemācīsies sadzīvot un saprast viens otru, bet arī mainīs viens otra dzīves uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa: Kā traka pēc viņa
programme.desc: Bridžita atkal ir viena un audzina 9 gadus veco Billiju un 4 gadus veco Meibelu. Iestrēgusi emocionālā nestabilitātē, viņa audzina bērnus ar uzticīgā drauga un bijušā mīļākā Daniela Klīvera palīdzību. Taču tad viņas dzīvē negaidīti uzrodas vēl kāds vīrietis.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Leģendārā Džūdija Gārlenda 1968. gada ziemā ierodas Londonā, lai uzstātos izpārdotu koncertu sērijā.

programme.title: 65: Iznīcības robeža
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofālas avārijas uz nezināmas planētas pilots Milss ātri vien aptver, ka viņam un otrai dzīvi palikušajai pasažierei Koai ir tikai vienīga iespēja izglābties – viņiem jātiek pāri nezināmajam apvidum, kuru pārņēmuši bīstami radījumi, un jāliek lietā visi spēki, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas mazulis
programme.desc: Bridžitai Džounsai (Renē Zelvēgere) paliek 43 gadi, un viņas māte Pamela (Džemma Džounsa) atgādina, ka bioloģiskais pulkstenis tikšķ. Apmeklējot kāda drauga bēres, kurš gājis bojā lidmašīnas katastrofā, viņa satiek savu bijušo – Marku Darsiju (Kolins Fērts), kurš ir kopā ar sievu Kamillu (Agni Skota). Pēc bēru ceremonijas viņa dodas uz pašreizējo darbu, kurā strādā par draudzenes un TV diktores Mirandas (Sāra Solemani) producenti. Viņa uzaicina Bridžitu nosvinēt neseno dzimšanas dienu, taču Bridžita atsaka, jo grasās to svinēt ar draugiem. Taču viņa paliek viena, jo visi draugi ir aizņemti ar saviem bērniem. Viņa bēdīga pieņem Mirandas piedāvājumu, un abas dodas uz mūzikas festivālu. Nepaiet ilgs laiks, līdz Bridžita ar seju iekrīt dubļos, taču viņai palīdz glīts svešinieks. Vēlāk festivāla laikā viņa piedzeras un nokļūst nepareizajā teltī, pārsteigta satiekot vīrieti, kurš viņai palīdzēja. Viņiem ir sekss. Nākamajā rītā viņa klusām aizlavās. Bridžita dodas uz kristībām, kurās viņa ir krustmāte un Marks ir krusttēvs. Viņš atklāj Bridžitai, ka šķirsies ar Kamillu. Viņiem ir sekss. Tad viņa atceras, ka viņš vienmēr darbu vērtēja augstāk par abu attiecībām, un no rīta klusām aizlavās, pirms viņš ir pamodies. Kad Bridžita pamana, ka pieņemas svarā, viņas draudzene Šazera (Sallija Filipsa) pārliecina veikt grūtniecības testu. Tests ir pozitīvs. Strādājot pie raidījuma, viņa pamana svešinieku no festivāla un pārsteigta uzzina, ka viņš ir miljardieris Džeks Kvants (Patriks Dempsijs). Viņa tam atklāj, ka ir stāvoklī. Neskatoties uz sākotnējo šoku, Džeks apsola viņu atbalstīt. To pašu pasaka Markam, kurš ir sajūsmā, ka kļūs par tēvu. Bridžita uzaicina Džeku uz pasākumu, un atklāj, ka tajā piedalās arī Marks. Abi vīrieši labi saprotas, un viņi visi kopā dodas vakariņās. Viņa atklāj, ka jebkurš no tiem var būt tēvs. Džeks to uztver labi, taču Marks aiziet. Mēnešiem ritot, Marks atjauno sakarus. Kļūdas dēļ Bridžita pamet darbu. Kā bezdarbniece viņa nomākta klīst pa lietu...

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Kaimiņu meitene
programme.desc: Mets nav no tiem jaunekļiem, kuri sarunā randiņus. Arī abi viņa draugi meitenes plikumus redzējuši tikai pornofilmās. Bet tad Metam kaimiņos ievācas satriecošs zaķis, kura turklāt izrāda viņam uzmanību un aicina uz randiņiem. Koledžas puiši acīmredzami Metu apskauž. Taču Mets vēl nav paspējis zaudēt nevainību satriecošās skaistules sabiedrībā, kad gaismā nāk fakts, ka meitene ir ... izbijusi pornofilmu aktrise.

programme.title: Cīņa caur tumsu
programme.desc: Tumšākajā Misisipi nostūri pagrīdes cīkstonim ir jādodas savā pēdējā cīņā, lai nomaksātu parādus un glābtu savas mirstošās audžumātes māju.

programme.title: Līdz džekpots mūs šķirs
programme.desc: Pēc trakulīgākajām izpriecām viņu mūžā divi svešinieki – Džeks (Eštons Kučers) un Džoja (Kamerona Diasa) – pamostas Lasvegasā un konstatē, ka ne tikai baudījuši seksu, bet vēl arī salaulājušies! Ceļā uz laulības anulēšanu komisku pavērsienu sagādā apstāklis, ka Džeks pie spēļu galda laimē trīs miljonus dolāru, derēdams uz Džojas monētu. Tādēļ tiesnesis viņiem piespriež sodu – sešus mēnešus "stingras laulības režīmā". Sākas karš starp abiem dzimumiem, jo Džeks un Džoja ir gatavi uz visu, lai otram izkrāptu naudu.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas mazulis
programme.desc: Bridžitai Džounsai (Renē Zelvēgere) paliek 43 gadi, un viņas māte Pamela (Džemma Džounsa) atgādina, ka bioloģiskais pulkstenis tikšķ. programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: Mēs visi svešinieki
programme.desc: Šajā aizkustinošajā, provokatīvajā stāstā par mīlestību, ģimeni un pagātnes rēgiem Ādams dzīvo vientuļu dzīvi, taču kādu vakaru viņu apciemo noslēpumains kaimiņš, kurš uzjundī sen apspiestas jūtas un atmiņas. Abu starpā rodas saikne un nenoliedzamas simpātijas, un Ādams nonāk savā bērnības mājā, kurā 30 gadus pēc nāves šķietami dzīvo viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Valencia
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: DFB Kauss. 2. kārta. Apskats
programme.desc: Report of matches from the German DFB-Pokal

programme.title: UFC. Fight Night: Steve Garcia vs David Onama
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. AS Monaco - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA .. Bucks - Kings
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Bayern - Bayer
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Teniss: Žurnāls. ATP Tour This Week. 42. raidījums
Basketbols: Eirolīga. Zalgiris Kaunas - ASVEL
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Atletico Madrid - Sevilla
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple is ready to fulfil their dream of living near the beach in Nantucket, MA. They hunt for a home with easy access to the water and town centre.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A woman has fallen in love with the charm of Hilton Head Island. Shes looking for a home close to the beach with rental potential and an updated kitchen.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Mortgage Free Home

Property expert Amanda finds four properties and invites homeowners to view them. Will they find their ideal home and relocate without the burden of monthly mortgage repayments?

programme.title: Mediterranean Life
programme.desc: Few places share the magical sparkle of the Mediterranean coastline, with many dreaming of one day purchasing property in this idyllic region. This reality series follows potential homeowners from the US as they look to find their dream property on the Med. From the extravagant luxuries of the French Riviera to the slower pace of life on the island of Sicily, each destination is engulfed in picturesque beaches, turquoise waters and unparalleled culture.

programme.title: The Weekend Workshop
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which a team of extremely talented people redesign and reinvent various forgotten and unused household items, breathing new life into them. Meet DIY lover Kate Humble, designer and re-inventor Max McMurdo, and up-cycler Zoe Pocock who will tackle a variety of exciting projects such as building a pizza oven, outdoor hot tub made from a Land Rover, transforming an old television set into a cocktail cabinet, and many more.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamhouse Challenge
programme.desc: Ashley Graham hosts as top home design and renovation experts and one celebrated chef transform a California home into a real-life Barbie Dreamhouse!

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse
programme.desc: Chip and Jo go big, reviving a lakehouse estate stuck in the 1960s. It requires overhauling the floorplan and blending two distinct design styles.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse
programme.desc: Chip and Jo come up with ways to bring the outdoors into the overall space to enhance the midcentury modern features and incredible cliffside view.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack continues his trip across the US as he explores a grandiose castle, a reimagined church and a sprawling ranch.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jacks search for the wildest homes continues with more houses for sale: an artists technicolour high-rise and a serene angelic retreat.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna transforms her parents outdoor patio into a beautifully updated glass-enclosed room perfect for potting plants and enjoying time with family.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna Gaines takes on mini projects with quick timelines, showcasing how creative ideas can make a big impact in small-scale renovations.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Join experts Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry, and Jason Martell as they embark on a global investigation, revisiting the series archives of "Ancient Aliens" to explore the most enigmatic archaeological sites, including Giza, Puma Punku and others.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a canoer capture footage of the legendary Bigfoot-like Skunk Ape walking in gator infested waters? Is NASA lying to us about the success of our Mars probes and presenting the public with footage that was shot in a remote location in Canada?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Forty miles west of La Paz, Bolivia - high in the Andes Mountains - lie the mysterious ancient ruins of Puma Punku. Could it have been built by extraterrestrials?

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a canoer capture footage of the legendary Bigfoot-like Skunk Ape walking in gator infested waters? Is NASA lying to us about the success of our Mars probes and presenting the public with footage that was shot in a remote location in Canada?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Follow award-winning actor Laurence Fishburne as he guides you through a number of mysteries that confused humanity for years, attempting to investigate what really happened, while looking at some new clues and leads. This documentary programme will try to answer some interesting and enduring questions, such as what was the true reason the Titanic sank, what happened to D.B. Cooper, did John Wilkes Booth fake his death, and many more.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Follow award-winning actor Laurence Fishburne as he guides you through a number of mysteries that confused humanity for years, attempting to investigate what really happened, while looking at some new clues and leads. This documentary programme will try to answer some interesting and enduring questions, such as what was the true reason the Titanic sank, what happened to D.B. Cooper, did John Wilkes Booth fake his death, and many more.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost history. Among the missing: actual lunar rocks brought back from the moon by American astronauts during the Apollo space program - and later stolen from NASA headquarters in a daring heist.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author, Brad Meltzer is a political thriller novelist, who has now scoured records of the most revered institutions in America. The likes of the US Supreme Court, the secret service, Wall Street and the presidency have come under Meltzers microscope, as he awakens dormant theories, codes and stories as he uncovers secrets of the organisations. Joined by a top team of investigative researchers, join Meltzer as he decodes some of Americas most perplexing mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost history. Among the missing: actual lunar rocks brought back from the moon by American astronauts during the Apollo space program - and later stolen from NASA headquarters in a daring heist.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author, Brad Meltzer is a political thriller novelist, who has now scoured records of the most revered institutions in America. The likes of the US Supreme Court, the secret service, Wall Street and the presidency have come under Meltzers microscope, as he awakens dormant theories, codes and stories as he uncovers secrets of the organisations. Joined by a top team of investigative researchers, join Meltzer as he decodes some of Americas most perplexing mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Ghost Bait
programme.desc: Enter the paranormal world of Bob Magill and Tina Storer, two pioneering investigators who delve into mysterious hauntings and happenings across the United States. programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Ghost Hunters is an American paranormal and documentary reality TV series. The hosts are Jason Hawes and Grant Wilson, plumbers by day, paranormal investigators by night. They are in charge of TAPS- The Atlantic Paranormal Society- a group of ordinary people interested in getting to the bottom of otherworldly disturbances. Together with their team Jason and Grant research supposed paranormal activity, from Mason, Ohios Kings Island amusement park to the Philadelphia Zoo. The purpose of the show is not to prove that a place was haunted, but the opposite. There is a healthy dose of scientific approach in each investigation.

programme.title: Who the Hell...

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: The burdening emotions of losing a loved one is a painful, all-consuming recovery process, but when that relative or friend was tragically murdered, the process of closure becomes far more difficult. This documentary series focusses on stories of everyday people who have been emotionally flattened following the murder of a loved one. With intimate and personal self-shot footage, the deceaseds family and friends detail their experiences with overcoming the devastation of losing someone close to their heart, as the series examines both the murder cases and the lasting after-effects.

programme.title: Most Evil
programme.desc: Crime documentary series in which forensic psychiatrist Dr. Michael H. Stone examines the roots of human evil by exploring acts committed by infamous criminals and ordinary people which he rates on scale of evil that he developed. His scale ranges from Category 1, which are those who kill in self-defense, to the Category 22, the serial torturer-murderers. Series also includes interviews with various neurologists, psychologists, and other forensic psychiatrists in an attempt to examine and profile the minds of killers. Partial re-enactments are also shown along with news footage, evidence, and reports from people who were somehow linked to the murderers and cases.

programme.title: The 1980s: The Deadliest Decade
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. programme.title: Border Control: Spain

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: Documentary series that looks at the impact a single crime can have on multiple lives. The show unearths past homicide cases that are still causing distress among the involved families today. Whether its witnesses, families of the victims, or law enforcement officers, each episode provides a unique perspective on the committed crime, with the three tales slowly intertwining into one. Shattered explores the ripple effect that flows through entire communities after such harrowing crimes and, with the help of re-enactments and these personal accounts, shows the eternal pain that will burden these families forever.

Тем временем угроза правлению Екатерины наступает с двух сторон: турецкий султан истребляет российское посольство, тем самым приближая войну, к которой Россия не готова. Другую угрозу представляют муж и дети племянницы Петра Великого Анны Леопольдовны, много лет живущие в ссылке в Холмогорах. Императрица решает их навестить, взяв с собою Павла.

programme.title: Живет Беларусь
programme.desc: 24 февраля Беларусь стала страной-агрессором. С этой мыслью жить страшно, особенно если ты второй год борешься с властью, которая это допустила. Каким видит свое будущее молодежь, которую всю жизнь учили чтить подвиги ветеранов, а теперь заставляют верить в необходимость новой войны?

programme.title: Живет Беларусь
programme.desc: В ста километрах на северо-запад от Минска расположен один из самых обычных провинциальных районных городков Беларуси - Воложин. Этот фильм про обыкновенных белорусских селян, колхозников, хуторян, фермеров и предпринимателей.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Уникальная игровая платформа, продолжающая традиции кубика Рубика. NASA не без проблем протестировало сверхмощную ракету для лунной миссии. Американские ученые придумали устройство, которое подавляет чувство голода.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Роботы добрались до домашних кухонь и готовят лучшую ресторанную еду. Новое поколение дронов летает дальше и дольше благодаря своей нестандартной конструкции. Ученые придумали, как взять #анализы без игл и шприцов, но с помощью пластыря. В Калифорнии исследователи обнаружили связь между высокой заболеваемостью коронавирусом и загрязненным воздухом.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Лучший друг человека - робот-пес нового поколения. Невидимые тачскрины, которые парят в воздухе. Разработка ученых из Пенсильвании позволит автобатареям заряжаться за 10 минут.

programme.title: Пять минут тишины
programme.desc: В часть МЧС, которой руководит майор Гиреев, приезжает с инспекцией подполковник Белов — бывший муж Тани. Он "копает" под Гиреева и Грека, пытаясь обвинить их в гибели спасателя. В больнице срочно требуется операция ребенку с редкой группой крови. Из Москвы отправляют контейнер с кровью для переливания, но медики "скорой" попадают в аварию — контейнер улетает в горную реку. К его поискам подключаются спасатели. Грек проявляет героизм и едва не погибает сам. Таня переживает за него, не скрывая своих чувств.

programme.title: Пять минут тишины
programme.desc: Грек решает остаться в отряде, но ему нужно вернуться в Москву за направлением. Он говорит Тане, что теперь их ничто не разлучит. Приехав домой, Грек видит Лину и узнает, что она беременна…

programme.title: Желание сердца
programme.desc: Жертвы домашнего насилия часто боятся делиться своими историями, испытывая неоправданный стыд и не желая проживать эти воспоминания снова. Сегодня Мерли спокойно и счастливо живет в своем доме, но всего несколько лет назад она ежедневно боялась за свою жизнь. Ее блог помог многим женщинам, проживающим подобный опыт, а команда "Желания сердца" исполнит одно ее заветное желание.

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Георгий Бусыгин проверяет готовность операционной к предстоящей операции вице-мэра города Мухина Игоря Борисовича Косарева. Однако проверка заканчивается трагедией - один из проводов коагулятора был подсоединён в обход блока защиты, и Георгия ударяет током. У него большой ожог и отслоение сетчатки. Операцию Косарева приходится перенести. Вице-мэр возмущен, но узнав о трагедии, говорит, что в больнице на него готовилось покушение. Натолкнуть Татьяну на верный след помогает герой Гастона Леру "Призрак Оперы".

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Георгий Бусыгин проверяет готовность операционной к предстоящей операции вице-мэра города Мухина Игоря Борисовича Косарева. Однако проверка заканчивается трагедией - один из проводов коагулятора был подсоединён в обход блока защиты, и Георгия ударяет током. У него большой ожог и отслоение сетчатки. Операцию Косарева приходится перенести. Вице-мэр возмущен, но узнав о трагедии, говорит, что в больнице на него готовилось покушение. Натолкнуть Татьяну на верный след помогает герой Гастона Леру "Призрак Оперы".

programme.title: Турция. Империя Эрдогана
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. Этот документальный фильм, снятый в преддверии всеобщих выборов в мае 2023 года, рассказывает о битвах, которые Эрдоган вел на своем пути к власти. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов. Многие полагают, что Эрдоган сделает все, чтобы остаться у власти.

programme.title: Турция. Империя Эрдогана
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. Этот документальный фильм, снятый в преддверии всеобщих выборов в мае 2023 года, рассказывает о битвах, которые Эрдоган вел на своем пути к власти. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов. Многие полагают, что Эрдоган сделает все, чтобы остаться у власти.

programme.title: Кто вам платит?
programme.desc: Гостем передачи "Кто вам платит?" в студии RUS TVNET стал экскурсовод, фанат архитектуры, автор YouTube-канала "Латентный модернист" Александр Семёнов, который рассказал о своих корнях, детстве в Екабпилсе, отказе от российского гражданства и своём убеждении, что некрасивых городов не бывает.

programme.title: Убийство, тайна и моя семья
programme.desc: Саша и Джереми изучают скандальное дело об убийстве полицейского, в ходе которого были арестованы десятки подозреваемых, и три человека отправились на виселицу.

programme.title: Следствие вели...
programme.desc: В 1989 году в посёлке Нижний Балыклей Волгоградской области накануне выборов народных депутатов СССР произошло жестокое убийство девушки-секретаря избирательной комиссии, а вскоре в Еланском районе в собственном доме были зарезаны пенсионер и его дочь.

programme.title: Аритмия
programme.desc: Олег — талантливый врач, работает на скорой, которая мчится от пациента к пациенту. Олег знает: его приезд может изменить все. Каждый его успех делает мир лучше. Самое важное — там, где он пытается совершить невозможное. А остальное может подождать: семья, карьера, своя жизнь… Что с ней случилось? Пока Олег спасал других, жена отчаялась и решила подать на развод, а в больнице появился новый начальник, который печется только о статистике и правилах. А Олег все спешит с вызова на вызов, несется по улице, чтобы все изменить. И кто знает, какая задача легче: спасать других или спасти себя?

programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Анатолий Цой и Алексей Чумаков проверят свою музыкальную интуицию и попробуют вычислить исполнителей с вокальными данными среди десяти участников. Помогать капитанам будут Марина Кравец, Антон Иванов, Виктория Складчикова и Алексей Шальнов.

programme.title: Эксы
programme.desc: Мы разошлись, но не можем друг без друга? Что это - любовь или привычка? Мы готовы на все, чтобы разобраться в наших чувствах. Участники - 10 пар бывших . Они жили вместе, любили друг друга, но по разным причинам - расстались. И все они так и не смогли "завязать" с отношениями. Их по-прежнему тянет друг к другу, они общаются, видятся, многие занимаются сексом. Что это - болезненная зависимость, привычка или любовь? На протяжении проекта пары бывших будут проходить испытания, которые помогут раскрыть их характеры, отношение друг к другу, вскроют самые сокровенные тайны и секреты. Та пара, которая пройдет все испытания и разберется до конца в себе и в своих отношениях, получит крупный денежный приз.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Россияне уже больше месяца вынуждены сидеть по домам — в режиме, как это назвали официальные власти, "самоизоляции". В городах-миллионниках и в совсем крошечных поселках. Для многих карантинные меры — изоляция и маски — это новый, малоприятный опыт. Мы попросили героев наших прошлых выпусков снять небольшие видео о том, как теперь им живётся в условиях глобального карантина. И рассказать, изменилась ли как-то их жизнь с момента выхода в эфир выпусков "Неизвестной России"?

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Горько-соленое море любви
programme.desc: Татьяна Гордеева работает массажисткой в районной поликлинике. Её сын Саша часто болеет и врач рекомендует свозить его к морю. А после того как муж Тани Валера неожиданно уходит от неё к другой женщине, прихватив из дома всё, что можно, она понимает, что поездка на юг необходима и ей самой — прийти в себя после пережитой обиды. В Турции Татьяна знакомится с импозантным владельцем отеля Акифом и постоялицей Любой — охотницей за богатыми женихами, которая тут же набивается ей в подруги. Но вскоре случается трагедия: Саша падает со скалы и попадает в больницу. Денег на лечение сына у Тани нет. Тогда Акиф делает Татьяне необычное предложение: стать сиделкой для его матери — вздорной и своевольной женщины Эдже, у которой никто из прислуги не продержался дольше недели…

programme.title: Горько-соленое море любви
programme.desc: Татьяна Гордеева работает массажисткой в районной поликлинике. Её сын Саша часто болеет и врач рекомендует свозить его к морю. Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: В южной части Карелии, у самой границы с Ленинградской областью, есть древний городок Олонец. Всё довольно обычно — вездесущий частный сектор и типовые советские здания. В одном из них таких зданий располагается Центр помощи детям №8 или, проще говоря, обычный детский дом. В нём живут почти полсотни ребят, оставшихся без родителей. Вернее, жили ещё недавно. Потому что работники детдома решили — на время всеобщего карантина — разобрать ребят по домам.

programme.title: С чистого листа
programme.desc: Даша Ермакова накануне свадьбы расстаётся с женихом и переезжает в Москву, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. Не найдя достойную работу и жильё, она соглашается на подработку у известного психотерапевта Михаила Литовченко. Вскоре она подвергается нападению, получает сильное сотрясение мозга и теряет память. А когда приходит в себя, ей говорят, что она — Ирина Литовченко, жена Михаила. Даше предстоит разобраться, кто она на самом деле, вспомнить свою любовь, которую она встретила незадолго до трагических событий, а еще выяснить, куда и почему пропала настоящая Ирина Литовченко.

programme.title: С чистого листа
programme.desc: Даша Ермакова накануне свадьбы расстаётся с женихом и переезжает в Москву, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа.
